Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: the *test_chaos.sh* script is hardcoded to "orderer1.example.com" and "peer0.org1.example.com". This needs to modified and should be able to read them based on the configuration used for the test case.

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: NetworkLauncher doesn't support service based discovery at this moment. Surya said, he is working on this feature.

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Surya executed this test case on July 13th build and observed service discovery is working as expected.
